name: incombustible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to burn easily: All the panels are made of incombustible materials that can be cut to fit. The disposal of incombustible waste has become a problem for many regional authorities. Synonym
noncombustibleRelated word
combustible
More examplesFewer examplesThe foam cools and sets, giving a light, strong, incombustible wall. Water is sprayed into the container, wetting the contents and making them incombustible.The result is an incombustible material with an extraordinary compressive strength.Some cities collect plastics as combustible waste, whereas others collect them as incombustible refuse.
